snippet: The first 82 games of the 2012-13 season were the latest casualty of the N.H.L. lockout, the third for the league since 1994.
abstract: NHL cancels the first two weeks of the regular season, a total of 82 games; more players are headed overseas as the lockout continues.
lead_paragraph: The first 82 games of the 2012-13 season were the latest casualty of the N.H.L. lockout, the third for the league since 1994.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Cancels First Two Weeks of Season
headline.main: Two Weeks of Hockey’s Regular Season Are Lost to Lockout
headline.print_headline: Two Weeks of Regular Season Are Lost to Lockout
